welcome:
Welcome to the VPN Bot!
You are registered as {role}. Use the menu buttons below to get started.

admin.prompt_add_inbound:
Send inbound information as: InboundID,FriendlyName
Example: 1,Main Server Inbound
admin.prompt_add_plan:
Send plan data as: Name,ServerID,InboundID,Country,VolumeGB,DurationDays,MultiUser,Price
Example: Basic,1,100,IR,50,30,1,5
admin.invalid_plan_format: Invalid format. Please send 8 comma-separated values.
admin.prompt_assign_role:
Send assignment as: @username ROLE
ROLE can be ADMIN or ACCOUNTANT.
admin.invalid_role: Role must be ADMIN or ACCOUNTANT.
admin.user_not_found: User not found. Ask them to /start the bot first.
admin.prompt_bank_card: Send the bank card number to store.

accountant.order_not_pending: Order is not waiting for approval.
accountant.receipt_rejected_notify: Your payment receipt was rejected. Please upload a new one.

user.send_receipt: Send payment receipt photo for order #{id}.
user.receipt_must_be_photo: Please send the receipt as a photo.
user.receipt_received: Receipt received. Please wait for review.
user.config_expired: Your VPN configuration expired and has been removed.
user.custom_plan_select_server: Select a server for your custom VPN plan:
user.custom_plan_no_servers: No servers available. Please contact admin.
user.custom_plan_invalid_volume: Invalid volume. Must be between {min_gb} and {max_gb} GB.
user.custom_plan_select_duration:
Enter duration in months (e.g., 3):

Server: {server}
Volume: {volume} GB
Min: {min_months} months, Max: {max_months} months

Enter number of concurrent users (e.g., 1):

Server: {server}
Volume: {volume} GB
Duration: {duration} months
Additional user price: ${additional_user_price} per user
